name: indissociably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not allow people or things to be considered as separate or not connected: She argues that the body and the mind are indissociably connected. Historically, cities have been indissociably linked with the rights of their citizens.
More examplesFewer examplesHis theories about art are indissociably related to his experiences in the First World War.The appeal of these stories is indissociably bound up with the idea of the supernatural.The voices of the individual singers were indissociably united to become a single sound.
